an2.64-76:64.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:64.1.3: The happiness of laypeople, and the happiness of renunciates.
an2.64-76:64.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:64.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of renunciates.”
an2.64-76:65.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:65.1.3: Sensual happiness and the happiness of renunciation.
an2.64-76:65.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:65.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of renunciation.”
an2.64-76:66.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:66.1.3: The happiness of attachments, and the happiness of no attachments.
an2.64-76:66.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:66.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of no attachments.”
an2.64-76:67.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:67.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:67.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of no defilements.”
an2.64-76:68.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:68.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:68.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is spiritual happiness.”
an2.64-76:69.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:69.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:69.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is noble happiness.”
an2.64-76:70.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:70.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:70.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is mental happiness.”
an2.64-76:71.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:71.1.3: Happiness with rapture and happiness free of rapture.
an2.64-76:71.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:71.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is happiness free of rapture.”
an2.64-76:72.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:72.1.3: The happiness of pleasure and the happiness of equanimity.
an2.64-76:72.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:72.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of equanimity.”
an2.64-76:73.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:73.1.3: The happiness of immersion and the happiness without immersion.
an2.64-76:73.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:73.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is the happiness of immersion.”
an2.64-76:74.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:74.1.3: Happiness that relies on rapture and happiness that relies on freedom from rapture.
an2.64-76:74.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:74.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is happiness that relies on freedom from rapture.”
an2.64-76:75.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:75.1.3: Happiness that relies on pleasure and happiness that relies on equanimity.
an2.64-76:75.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:75.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is happiness that relies on equanimity.”
an2.64-76:76.1.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:76.1.3: Happiness that relies on form and happiness that relies on the formless.
an2.64-76:76.1.4: These are the two kinds of happiness.
an2.64-76:76.1.5: The better of these two kinds of happiness is happiness that relies on the formless.”
